评论概述: HONEST review of this affordable yet fall fashion find for my husband
评论详情: Great Quality & Affordable Fashion Find!  My husband has always had a hard time finding affordable yet stylish clothing online, but this Hanes Men’s Beefy-T Henley Shirt in navy really impressed us! The fabric is soft, thick, and feels like it’s built to last, which is exactly what he needed. The fit is true to size, and the cotton material makes it super comfortable for everyday wear.  He loves the Henley style because it’s a step up from a basic tee without feeling too formal. The long sleeves are perfect for cooler days, and the color is rich and classic. It’s a great staple piece that works well for casual outfits or even for layering.  The best part? It’s budget-friendly! It’s hard to find affordable fashion online that doesn’t compromise on quality, but this shirt checks all the boxes. We’ll definitely be purchasing more colors in the future.  Highly recommend for anyone looking for a quality, affordable shirt for their wardrobe!
A decent shirt.  Like the description says, the material is t-shirt weight, but it's not too thin.  It fits on the snugger side, but still roomy.
Nice looking shirt. Like the color, weight, and feel. Sleeves are long enough for long arms. The length of the shirt could be a little longer. Overall, worth the money.....would buy again
The shirt fit well. True to size. Washes and dried nicely. Good shirt, comfortable and affordable.

Hanes Men's BeefyT Henley Shirts are an absolute staple in my wardrobe. The cotton fabric is thick and durable, providing all-day comfort without feeling too heavy. The long sleeves are perfect for layering in cooler weather, and the Henley style adds a classic touch. The fit is true to size and has a relaxed feel that moves with you. Whether I’m lounging at home or out running errands, these shirts deliver a timeless, comfortable look that can’t be beat. Great for any casual occasion! 🧥✨

I ordered 4 of these shirts for my husband in different colors. I ordered his usual size and they fit well. They are really nice-looking, and thick material. I wash them on cold and dry on low. The bottom hems turn up sometimes after washing but if I give the shirt a shake before putting it on the hanger it folds back down. They came with an unnecessarily large label attached to the hem, so I cut it off. They have not faded or become misshapen. By the way, Amazon added my height and weight at the top, it is not my husband's, who wears the size XL shirts!

There is a reason for the cheap price.  First, it is Beefy, no doubt it is thick.  However, it is not soft.  Do not expect it to be soft, you will have to wash and dry several times with fabric softener.Second, The fit is not right for me.  I am 5'11"  177lbs.  33 in waist.  The fit is bit loose around the waist!.  This is not an athletic cut.

评论概述: Great shirts. Great for tall upper bodies like mine. I've bought 4 different colors.
评论详情: Best shirts I own, besides button down dress shirts. Bought 4 different colors- so far. Warm & comfortable. Love the fact that they fit a tall bodied people like me not to mention a little extra weight in the belly. Tuck them in and no plumbers butt. Sure, they say just a t-shirt but much more. The 5 or so buttons give them a little class. I wear one of the 4 colors  I own several days of the week. I will be buying more. Great job whoever or wherever there made. 5 stars !!

评论概述: Nice but not really a heavy weight
评论详情: I love henleys and own several that I bought years ago. They were truly heavy weights, or beefy you could say, which I enjoy in the winter.  They are wearing out now.  The first replacement I found online was light weight and that put me on a long 'unfulfilled' search.  Probably my fault, but I came across these guys marketed as "Beefy" and bought one.  Nice shirt, but it belongs in the lighter weight category.  "Beefy", it is not.  This is the reason I gave it four stars instead of five.  Just know it is marketed as something it isn't.  It's half way close to the description, though, and I like it well enough to buy more, especially at the good price they offer..

评论概述: Excellent quality for the price! Very comfortable !
评论详情: My husband and I definitely give this a five star review! My husband said the quality of these shirts for the price is excellent! They come in very nice colors and the quality of the material is very good! Super comfortable and roomy. The length on the shirt is perfect even for my husband who is 6’4” and 200 pounds. He ordered the extra large and it fits very comfortably. He uses these shirts as lounge sleepwear. We ordered five! He is happy with all the colors, the fit, and the overall quality of this shirt! Definitely recommend these!

I am sooo happy with my purchase.  I’m going to order more right now.  They fit perfectly. Exactly as described.  I was actually surprised.  I figured it would be to good to be true kind of thing.  But  nice fit, great quality and great price.
I bought 2 of these shirts for family members.  Good quality fabric.  Had a decent weight to it without being too heavy. I would buy these again in different colors.

评论概述: Might be slightly slimmer cut, too early to tell.
评论详情: I count on Long Sleeved Tees in the heavier Weight by Hanes as great accompaniment to winter sleep and lounge pajama pants accompaniment. I am particularly fond of the Rugby style as the buttons make it easier to pull over the head. I am a woman who usually buys a size medium but purchased the large this year as reviews state is is shaped as more appropriate for a young man. I do like a looser shirt for sleep and find the quality and cost is men's tees to exceed that of women's wear. It is a lovely rich blue color. From experience,  these shirts wash and dry well, no fading or shrinkage.

I purchased one last Christmas for my oldest son, (6'2" 225). I got him and XXL. I ordered 3 more this year. XXL for my oldest, XL for my 6' 200lb husband and L for my 5'10" 190lb son. They love the comfort, the fabric does not lose its shape or fade. The one I bought last year looks as good as the new ones I bought!

评论概述: Shirts for the out of store shopper.
评论详情: Basic, long-sleeved tee with buttons, looks nice on my giftee, lightweight, stayed true to size, no shrinkage and the shirt held it's shape after washing. The color is true to black that was ordered.
Soft cotton. Great color. The color did not run either when I washed it.  No shrinkage.  It fits perfectly.

The shirt itself is very nice but runs very small and slim.  My bf wants more in different colors. The Small is more like a boy's size small-slim.  I needed a mens size small but this fit is an extra small fit and very slim cut.  Ordering a small is usually never a problem in any company purchased but I'm going to probably order a large in replacement for this Small because of shrinkage when washed and dried.  That's how small it is.  I'm surprised because Hanes is a good brand.  Order at least one size bigger than normal and keep your fingers crossed.  If you need width then this shirt is not for you. The length is 27 inches from the back of the collar to hem. The sleeve length from the top of the shoulder is 25.5 inches. The armpit to armpit is 17.25 inches. Across the bottom hem is 17.5 inches.  Normal t shirt type material, not a soft blend. Maybe after laundry and  fabric softener that will change.  Overall nice shirt but again runs very small and slim.
